description: Resource Type definition for AWS::MWAAServerless::Workflow resource

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(?:-(?:cn|us-gov|iso|iso-b|iso-e|iso-f))?:airflow-serverless:([a-z]{2}-[a-z]+-[0-9]{1}):([0-9]{12}):workflow/([a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9\.\-_]{0,254}-[a-zA-z0-9]{10})$  
Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(?:-(?:cn|us-gov|iso|iso-b|iso-e|iso-f))?:iam::[0-9]{12}:role(/[a-zA-Z0-9+=,.@_-]{1,512})*?/[a-zA-Z0-9+=,.@_-]{1,64}$  
Update requires: No interruption
